name: sankey-plus
description: A JavaScript library for computing and drawing Sankey graphs.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:types && vite build
scripts.build:types: rimraf types && tsc --project tsconfig.types.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('types',{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('src/types/index.d.ts','types/index.d.ts');"
